rewrite1:
Please proceed with the following adjustments to the document formatting:

- For the section you've highlighted: change the outline level to 6 and alter the line spacing to 1 cm.
- In the seventh paragraph: insert an 8 pt space above the paragraph and ensure that the text is not bold.
- Regarding the ninth paragraph: adjust the line spacing to Multiple with a setting of 3 lines, add a 1.5 cm space following the paragraph, underline the text, and italicize the font for emphasis.
rewrite2:
Please adjust the formatting for the specified sections as follows:

For the highlighted section, set the outline level to Level 6 and adjust the line spacing to 1 cm.

In the seventh paragraph, insert an 8 pt space above the paragraph and remove any bold formatting from the text.

Regarding the ninth paragraph, change the line spacing to Multiple with a factor of 3 lines, add a space of 1.5 cm following the paragraph, underline the text, and apply italic styling to it.
rewrite3:
To format the selected section, please set the Outline Level to 6 and adjust the line spacing to 1 cm.

In the case of the seventh paragraph, introduce a space of 8 pt above it and ensure that the text is not bolded.

When you reach the ninth paragraph, change the line spacing to Multiple with an interval of 3 lines. Following that, add a space of 1.5 cm below the paragraph, apply an underline to the text, and italicize it for emphasis.
